entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening then periods of snow changing to 30 percent chance of flurries near midnight. Local amount 2 cm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 70 becoming southwest 50 gusting to 70 this evening then diminishing to 30 gusting to 50. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 10 this evening.
